description:
Accepting clients by appointment only from our office in Jeffersonville, Indiana, the attorneys at The Law Office of Nick Stein deliver highly compassionate and effective legal counsel and support to clients throughout Clark County and the surrounding areas. We help those who have legal needs involving any of the following:

• Personal injury, wrongful death and medical malpractice
• Criminal defense
• Family law and divorce
• Estate planning

Combined, our law firm's attorneys possess more than 50 years of legal experience, so you can trust we have the extensive knowledge, skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently and to improve the likelihood you will obtain the favorable outcome you expect and deserve. Our founder, attorney Nick Stein, has lived in the area his entire life, so he has a genuine concern for the legal issues that affect the residents of our community.

Working alongside a team of some of the best and brightest minds in the profession, Mr. Stein and the other legal professionals at The Law Office of Nick Stein promise to deliver the personalized attention you deserve and the aggressive advocacy you need to increase your chances of obtaining the positive results you seek.

From our efforts, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff injury clients while helping many others find effective solutions and successful outcomes for their serious and pressing legal challenges efficiently and cost-effectively.

For a complete evaluation of your legal needs and to find out how we can best serve you and your family, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation.
